metadata.synopsis: Mizora contacts Wyll after she's been captured by the cultists. Not a lot of choices here, but you can try and find out how she got caught and express opinion on getting her out.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter act 2 and visit camp repeatedly, or enter town area through any approach.

26.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party stops as they walk through shadow-cursed town

56.speaker: Wyll
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

27.speaker: Mizora
27.text: Such a good boy you are - I've trained you well. But a quick review of the rules wouldn't hurt.

66.speaker: Wyll
66.text: And this is my problem how, exactly?
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

68.speaker: Wyll
68.text: Forget it. This 'asset' can rot in there for all I care.
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

72.speaker: Mizora
72.text: I'd start caring - and quick, sunshine.

12.speaker: Wyll
12.text: If this devil is so powerful, how did they manage to get captured?
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

47.speaker: Mizora
47.text: Questions, questions - you're wasting my time. Let's see about getting your priorities fixed.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

74.speaker: Wyll
74.text: *Mizora's words may be flippant, but they are tinged with desperation. She cannot afford for you to fail this mission.*
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

11.text: *Mizora's words may be flippant, but they are tinged with desperation. She cannot afford for you to fail this mission.*
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

15.speaker: Narrator
15.text: *Mizora's words may be flippant, but they are tinged with desperation. She cannot afford for you to fail this mission.*
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *This may be your best chance to negotiate your way out of your pact.*
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

22.speaker: Wyll
22.text: I'll do it on one condition: you free me from this infernal pact.
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

6.speaker: Mizora
6.text: Interesting. Now why should I go letting my favourite pet off his leash?
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

51.speaker: Wyll
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

19.speaker: Mizora
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laughing hysterically that a player tried a children's incantation to release themselves from a devil's contract.NodeContext: Mizora is still in her pod, laughing hysterically at the player

7.speaker: Wyll
7.text: How about I let the cult infect this devil instead? I bet they'd make a loyal thrall.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

75.speaker: Mizora
75.text: Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

34.speaker: Mizora
34.text: Clause Z, Section Thirteen - the 'Lemure' clause. Could've sworn we covered this.

14.text: Incredible - you actually think you hold the winning hand.

38.speaker: Mizora
38.text: Incredible - you actually think you hold the winning hand.

2.speaker: Wyll
2.text: Ponder the ins and outs of your contract. Could there be a loophole?
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *Your own contract is airtight. But you recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's pact: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

40.speaker: Narrator
40.text: *Your own contract is airtight. But you recall an old incantation from a children's story, said to void a devil's pact: 'Abi, diabole, et nunquam redi.'*

0.text: *You can think of no way to void a devil's pact.*

62.speaker: Narrator
62.text: *You can think of no way to void a devil's pact.*

57.speaker: Wyll
57.text: Say you know a pact-breaking charm and chant a series of pseudo-Infernal phrases.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

25.speaker: Mizora
25.text: I've never seen such a fearless display of sheer idiocy. Bravo!
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

17.speaker: Mizora
17.text: I've never seen such a fearless display of sheer idiocy. Bravo!
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

23.speaker: Mizora
23.text: Fine, I'll play your game. But I amend the pact once the mission's done - not before.
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

70.speaker: Mizora
70.text: Clause F, Section Nine: 'Soul-binder shall bestow reward or favour only upon soul-bearer's fulfilment of related obligation.'
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

18.speaker: Mizora
18.text: Now to Moonrise, pet. And do mind the shadows - they've been especially hungry.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mizora's holographic image sinks into the devilish circle and it closes behind.

5.text: Ugh - heartbreaking. I bet you thought I'd be impressed.

50.speaker: Mizora
50.text: Ugh - heartbreaking. I bet you thought I'd be impressed.

24.speaker: Wyll
24.text: Never mind. I'll free Zariel's asset.

30.speaker: Mizora
30.text: Compliance. Just as it should be.

49.speaker: Wyll
49.text: I will make sure it's done.

52.context: CinematicNodeContext: A diabolical circle starts to draw itself on the ground. Our of it rises a hologram of Mizora, though not Mizora herself.

31.speaker: Mizora
31.context: NodeContext: Like she's talking about flowers, but she's talking about Mizora, who she hates, and who's just popped into their camp uninvited

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: Ahh, I love this time of year. The dickheads start popping up wherever you look.
21.context: NodeContext: Like she's talking about flowers, but she's talking about Mizora, who she hates, and who's just popped into their camp uninvited

63.speaker: Karlach
63.text: Ahh, I love this time of year. The dickheads start popping up wherever you look.
63.context: NodeContext: Like she's talking about flowers, but she's talking about Mizora, who she hates, and who's just popped into their camp uninvited

8.speaker: Mizora
8.text: Drop the attitude and perk up your ears - you've got a new mission.

58.speaker: Mizora
58.text: Absolute's cult has gone and grabbed one of Zariel's assets. A devil - and a powerful one at that.

54.speaker: Mizora
54.text: They're locked up in the cult's fortress, Moonrise Towers. And you're getting 'em out.

44.speaker: Wyll
44.text: Is that so? Give me one reason why I shouldn't let them rot.

55.speaker: Mizora
55.text: Ahem. Clause Z, Section Thirteen: 'Should promised soul refuse obeyance or neglect duty, the pact-holder shall cast the promised into Avernus as a lemure.'

64.speaker: Mizora
64.text: I'll make it simple: you fail or refuse, and you turn to a thick blob of stink-flesh and sink to Avernus.

46.speaker: Mizora
46.text: Now be a good boy and play fetch, pup - or you'll spend an eternity sizzling in the Hells.
